title: In search of balance
creator_credit: Anthony T Lorch and National Recreation and Park Association
brief_description: A film to make communities aware of the value and need for recreation and park services. Illustrates passive and active recreation, solitary and group interaction and structured and unstructured activities. Also reveals the many concerns of environmentalists and conservationists and traces the origin of recreation as we know it today.
